chapaGateway: Powered by a reliable and secure payment gateway.
languagesSupported: Available in English, Oromo, and Amharic.
powerfulManagement: Powerful tools for easy management of bookings and facilities.
tagline: Your one-stop solution for booking facilities and dormitories with ease.
faqSubtitle: Have questions? We have answers. If you can't find what you're looking for, feel free to contact us.
privacyPolicyContent: Your privacy policy content goes here. Please update it in the admin settings.
termsOfServiceContent: Your terms of service content goes here. Please update it in the admin settings.
pageNotFoundMessage: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for. It might have been moved or doesn't exist.
selectDateRangePrompt: To see what's available, please select your desired check-in and check-out dates.
pickADateRange: Select your check-in and check-out dates
fillFormToBookDormitory: Please fill out the form below to complete your booking request.
enterEmployer: Enter the name of your employer or organization
dateRangeRequired: Please select a start and end date.
dormitoryBookingPendingApproval: Your request has been received. You will receive an SMS with payment instructions shortly. Please check your messages.
errorSavingBooking: There was an error saving your booking. Please try again.
itemNotFound: The item you are trying to book could not be found. It may have been removed.
errorFetchingDormitoryDetails: Could not load the details for this dormitory. Please go back and try again.
fillFormToBookFacility: Please fill out the form below to request a booking for the selected facility.
enterContactPerson: Enter the name of the contact person
addLedProjectorDescription: This service is available for sections.
anySpecialRequests: Let us know if you have any special requests.
itemNotAvailableError: {itemName} is currently not available for booking.
invalidItemId: The provided item ID is not valid.
noItemIdProvided: No item ID was specified in the request.
errorFetchingItemDetails: There was an error fetching the details for this item. Please try again.
mustBeLoggedInAsCompany: You must be logged in as an approved company representative to book facilities.
loginAsCompanyToBook: You need to be logged in as an approved company representative to book halls or sections.
accountPendingApprovalBookFacility: Your company's registration is still pending approval. You cannot make bookings until your account is approved.
selectAndBookMultiple: Select multiple items and book them all at once.
pleaseSelectItemsToBook: Please select one or more items to book.
errorFetchingHallsAndSections: Could not load the list of halls and sections.
selectDateRangeFirst: Please select a date range first to check availability.
thankYouFacilityBookingWillBeReviewed: Thank you for your request. Our team will review the booking and get back to you shortly with a confirmation and further details.
enterCredentialsToAccessAccount: Enter your credentials to access your account.
needAccount: Need an account for your company?
individualUserNote: Individual users do not need to register. You can book a dormitory directly.
invalidCredentials: The email or password you entered is incorrect. Please try again.
userDataMissingError: Could not find your user details after logging in. Please contact support.
invalidEmailFormat: The email address is not formatted correctly.
companyRegistrationDescription: Register your company to book halls and other facilities.
registrationSubmittedMessage: Your registration has been submitted and is pending approval. We will notify you once it's reviewed.
unknownError: An unknown error occurred. Please try again.
emailAlreadyInUseError: This email address is already in use. Please log in or use a different email.
weakPasswordError: The password is too weak. It should be at least 6 characters long.
contactUsSubtitle: We're here to help. Reach out to us with any questions or for assistance with your booking.
contactBuildingAdminsDesc: For specific questions about dormitory rooms or your stay, please contact the respective building administrator.
generalInquiriesDesc: For all other questions, including facility rentals and general information.
googleMapsEmbedTitle: Location of Oromia Education Research and Training Center
mapEmbedNote: The map shows our approximate location. Please call for precise directions if needed.
discoverMoreSubtitle: Scan the QR code with your phone to view our digital brochure and learn more about our services and facilities.
scanForBrochureDesc: Get our digital brochure on your phone.
brochureSubtitle: Your premier destination for educational events, training, and accommodation at {siteName}.
brochureAboutUsContent: The {siteName} is a center of excellence dedicated to providing top-tier facilities for training, research, and educational events. We offer modern, well-equipped spaces and comfortable accommodations to support your learning and development goals.
brochureDormitoriesDesc: Clean, secure, and well-maintained dormitory rooms available for individuals and groups.
brochureHallsDesc: Versatile halls and sections equipped with the latest technology for your meetings, workshops, and events.
brochureCateringDesc: Delicious and customizable catering options, including refreshments and full lunch services.
brochureKeyFeaturesMore: ...and much more to ensure a productive and comfortable stay.
brochureWhyChooseExcellentService: Dedicated staff and excellent customer service.
brochureWhyChooseCommitmentToQuality: A strong commitment to quality and creating a conducive learning environment.
brochureCallToActionDesc: Ready to book or have more questions? Contact us today. We look forward to hosting you!
myDormitoryDescription: Enter the phone number you used to book to check the status of your active or upcoming dormitory bookings.
pleaseEnterPhoneNumber: Please enter a phone number to search.
errorSearchingBookings: An error occurred while searching for your bookings. Please try again later.
noActiveBookingsFoundForPhone: No active or upcoming dormitory bookings were found for this phone number.
bookingConfirmedDesc: Your payment has been verified and your booking is confirmed. We look forward to your arrival.
paymentProofRequiredDesc: To finalize your booking, please upload a screenshot of your payment confirmation.
paymentAwaitingVerificationDesc: We have received your payment proof and it is currently being verified by our team. Thank you for your patience.
bookingRejectedDesc: Unfortunately, there was an issue with your booking or payment, and it has been rejected. Please contact our office for assistance.
dormitoryIdMissing: Dormitory ID is missing from the request.
noAvailabilityData: No availability data found for this dormitory.
selectDatesForAccurateAvailability: For the most accurate availability, pick your dates
showingAllAdminAvailableDorms: Currently showing all dormitories marked as available by the administration. Select a date to see real-time availability.
noDormsAvailableInDateRange: Sorry, no dormitories are available for the selected dates. Please try a different date range.
noDormitoriesConfigured: No dormitories have been configured in the system yet.
selectDateRangeFirstTooltip: You must select a date range before you can book.
selectItemsFirstTooltip: You must select one or more items to book.
loginToBookMultipleDesc: To book multiple items at once, please log in with your company account.
noItemsCurrentlyMatchFilters: There are no facilities that match your current filter.
pleaseSelectDateRangeToEnableBooking: Please select a date range to enable booking.
dormitoryCapacityNotConfigured: This dormitory's capacity is not configured correctly. Please contact an administrator.
dormitoryBedsUnavailable: Sorry, all beds in {roomName} are already booked for the selected dates.
itemUnavailableConflict: Sorry, {itemName} is already booked for some or all of the selected dates.
facilityNotAvailableOverride: {itemName} is currently set to unavailable by an administrator.
dormitoryNotAvailableAdminOverride: {roomNumber} is currently unavailable and cannot be booked. Please contact an administrator.
fillFormToBookSelectedItems: You are booking multiple facilities. Please fill out the form below to complete your request.
errorFetchingItemDetailsMulti: An error occurred while fetching details for {itemName}. It has been removed from your selection.
itemNotFoundDatabase: Could not find {itemName} in the database. It has been removed from your selection.
noItemsSelectedForBooking: No items were selected for booking. Redirecting you back.
accountPendingApprovalMultiBook: Your company account is pending approval. You may browse facilities, but you cannot complete a booking until your account is approved.
noValidItemsForBooking: There are no valid or available items to book based on your selection.
bookingForItems: You are booking the following item(s)
phoneForTelegramIdentification: This will be used to identify your payment proof if you submit it via Telegram.
phoneForTelegramIdentificationOptional: This can be used to identify your payment proof if you submit it via Telegram.
sorryYouCannotBookTwice: Our records show you already have a booking for this date. You cannot make another booking for the same day.
firestoreIndexRequiredErrorDetailed: A database configuration is required to perform this check. Please contact the site administrator and ask them to create the necessary Firestore index.
duplicateCheckSkippedBookingProceeds: Could not check for duplicate bookings due to a missing database index. Your booking will proceed, but please ensure you have not booked for this date before.
errorCalculatingTotalCostNaN: An error occurred while calculating the total cost. Please check the booking details and try again.
bookingPermissionDeniedErrorDetailed: You do not have permission to create bookings. Please check your account status or contact an administrator.
facilityBookingPendingApproval: Your request has been received. Our team will review it and you will be notified upon approval.
errorSubmittingBooking: An error occurred while submitting your booking. Please try again.
incompleteBookingConfirmationDetails: Incomplete booking details. Please return to the homepage and try again.
paymentAwaitingTelegramVerificationDesc: We have received your payment proof via Telegram and it is currently being verified by our team. Thank you for your patience.
bankDetailsNotConfiguredContactAdmin: Bank account details have not been configured by the administrator. Please contact our office directly to arrange payment.
pageNoLongerInUseMessage: This page is no longer part of our booking process. Please book through the main dormitory or halls pages.
translationSuccessfulDesc: The text has been translated and the fields have been updated.
translationFailedDesc: Could not translate the text at this time. Please try again later.
translationSourceMissingDesc: Please enter text in the English field before using the auto-translate feature.
